title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 4030/89 of 28 December 1989 extending the Community surveillance of imports of certain products originating in Japan
header:
COMMISSION  REGULATION (EEC) No 4030/89
of 28 December 1989
extending the Community surveillance of imports of certain products originating in Japan
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 5 of Regulation (EEC) No 653/83, '31 December 1989' is replaced by '31 December 1990'.
The Annex to Regulation (EEC) No 653/83 is replaced by the Annex to this Regulation.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day following its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
It shall apply from 1 January 1990.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
